SEARCH
Modul api
Package de.kaiser.api

Klasse PdfGenerationFacade

java.lang.Object
de.kaiser.api.PdfGenerationFacade
public final class PdfGenerationFacade extends Object
The facade is the central entry point for the creation of a PDF. It orchestrates the entire process and is designed to be stateless.
